name: Placement-Cell
desc: Employees can sign in and add details of the students and their placement details.This web application is built using Node.Js, EJS, MongoDB, ExpressJs.

name: Habit Tracker
desc: Habit tracker application used to track our daily habits or tasks and gives us our weekly analysis.

name: Todo List
desc: A basic Todo-list app using vanilla JS , where user can add and delete the tasks.

name: CSV-Uploader
desc: An application in which we could upload the csv file and as well as read, access its contents in tabular form. Can view all uploaded CSV files & delete the files.

name: Calculator
desc: Created a simple calculator for arithmetic operations using ReactJS

name: Invoicing - Billing Application
desc: An Invoice billing application build using React,bootstrap and TailwindCSS. Has a sign up and sign in form , which then redirects to the invoice form.
